snippet.title: Colin McRae Rally | Launch Trailer (iOS)
snippet.description:
We're bringing that classic Colin McRae Rally experience to a new generation of gamers and devices with the release of Colin McRae Rally for iOS. This is our first Rally game for these platforms, and we wanted to make tackling every turn and jump of the point-to-point courses on your mobile just as satisfying as playing on home consoles, so we went back to those early titles as inspiration to recreate an experience with the soul of the original but much more focused on what was at the core of the series, Stage Rally.

Download Colin McRae Rally from the app store now https://itunes.apple.com/app/id566286915
